const Item = [
	{Name: "A0101", Type: "A", Tier: "1", Value: 100},
	{Name: "A0102", Type: "A", Tier: "2", Value: 1000},
	{Name: "A0103", Type: "A", Tier: "3", Value: 10000},
	{Name: "A0104", Type: "A", Tier: "4", Value: 100000},
	{Name: "A0105", Type: "A", Tier: "5", Value: 1000000},
	{Name: "B0101", Type: "B", Tier: "1", Value: 200},
	{Name: "B0102", Type: "B", Tier: "2", Value: 2000},
	{Name: "B0103", Type: "B", Tier: "3", Value: 20000},
];


// 変数宣言
// {Name, ValueUp, Donation[5]}
const CheckItemDB = new IndexedDB({store: "CheckItem", key: "Name"});
// {Type, CostDown, TypeValueUp, AllValueUp}
const CheckTypeDB = new IndexedDB({store: "CheckType", key: "Type"});
// {Name, Type, Tier, Value, }
const ListMap = new Map();
const SellMap = new Map();
const BuyMap = new Map();
const EnchantMap = new Map();

const Value = [1, 1.25, 2, 3, 5];
const Status = [1, 1.25, 1.5, 2, 3];

//const AllValueUp = [...CheckTypeMap].reduce((result, [k, v]) => v.AllValueUp ? ++result : result, 0);

// 関数宣言
const startup = async () => {
	// データ準備
// {Name, Type, Tier, Value, IncreaseValue, DiscountEnergy, SurchageEnergy, SurchageEnergyCD, A, D, H, E, C}
	const ItemMap = new Map(getItemEntries());
	const EnchantedEMap = new Map(getEntries(EnchantedE));
	const EnchantedSMap = new Map(getEntries(EnchantedS));
	const LocalStringMap = new Map(getEntries(LocalString));
	ItemMap.forEach((v, k) => {
		v.EnchantedE = EnchantedEMap.has(v.Name);
		v.EnchantedS = EnchantedSMap.has(v.Name);
		v.LocalName = LocalStringMap.get(v.Name) ?? v.Name;

		createList();
		//viewList
		const {Name, Type, Tier, Value} = v;
		const list = {Name, Type, Tier, Value};
		list.LocalName = LocalStringMap.get(Name) ?? Name;
		list.LocalType = LocalStringMap.get(Type) ?? Type;
		list.LocalTier = LocalStringMap.get(Tier) ?? Tier;
		list.NowValue = undefined;
		list.NowValue = undefined;
		ListMap.set(Name, list);
	});
	// 画面要素初期化
/*
	・基本データからすべてのビューデータを生成（生成は１度だけ）

	・ビュー切替やフィルター切替でフィルター条件に該当するデータを抽出し画面要素を生成、
	　生成中にデータバインドでデータを埋め込む

	・データ更新時に関連するビューデータへの反映も行う
*/

	// イベント設定
	document.querySelectorAll("[name=selectTier]").forEach(e => e.addEventListener("change", toggleTierAll));
	document.querySelectorAll(".toggleView").forEach(e => e.addEventListener("change", toggleView));
	document.querySelectorAll(".toggleFilter").forEach(e => e.addEventListener("change", toggleFilter));
	// 画面表示
	document.querySelector(".toggleView").dispatchEvent(new Event("change"));
	// 読み込み画面解除
	document.querySelector(".loading").classList.add("reject");
	document.querySelector("main").classList.remove("reject");
}

const toggleTierAll = () => document.querySelector("[name=selectTierAll]").checked = document.querySelector("[name=selectTier]:checked") ? false : true;
const toggleView = () => {
	const target = document.querySelector("[name=selectView]:checked").value;
	const setMap = {
		"viewList": setListMap,
		"viewSell": setSellMap,
		"viewBuy": setBuyMap,
		"viewEnchant": setEnchantMap,
	};
	if(target in setMap) setMap[target]();

	// 表示ビューの切替
	document.querySelectorAll(".toggleViewTarget").forEach(e => (e.classList.contains(target)) ? e.classList.remove("reject") : e.classList.add("reject"));
}
const setListMap = () => {
	if(ListMap.size) return;

}
const setSellMap = () => {
	if(SellMap.size) return;

}
const setBuyMap = () => {
	if(BuyMap.size) return;

}
const setEnchantMap = () => {
	EnchantMap.clear();

}
// ビュー作成
const createList = () => {
	$viewList.querySelectorAll(".cloned").forEach(e => e.parentNode.removeChild(e));
	const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
	$viewList.appendChild(fragment);
// 選択グループに従い親要素作成
// ListMapから対象データを抽出
// 抽出データをループし適切な親要素に子要素作成（子要素に値を埋め込む）
// 子要素のない親要素を非表示
}
const createSell = () => {
	const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
	$viewSell.appendChild(fragment);
}
const createBuy = () => {
	const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
	$viewBuy.appendChild(fragment);
}
const createEnchant = () => {
	const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
	$viewEnchant.appendChild(fragment);
}
const createCheckItem = () => {
	const donate = document.querySelector("[name=Donate]:checked").value;
	const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
	$viewCheckItem.appendChild(fragment);
}
const createCheckType = () => {
	const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
	$viewCheckType.appendChild(fragment);
}
// ビュー更新
const updateList = () => {
// 
	const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
	$viewList.appendChild(fragment);
}
const updateSell = () => {
	const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
	$viewSell.appendChild(fragment);
}
const updateBuy = () => {
	const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
	$viewBuy.appendChild(fragment);
}
const updateEnchant = () => {
	const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
	$viewEnchant.appendChild(fragment);
}
// データバインド
/*
const startup = () => {
	setList($ListA, ListAMap, toDOM);
}

const setList = (element, map, callback) => {
	element.querySelectorAll("[data-parent]").forEach(e => {
		const key = e.dataset.parent;
		const value = map.get(key);
		callback(e, value);
	});
}
const toDOM = (parent, obj) => {
	const childList = parent.querySelectorAll(`[data-bind]`);
	childList.forEach(child => {
		const [attr, prop, i] = child.dataset.bind.split(":");
		child[attr] = i ? obj[prop][i] : obj[prop];
	});
}
*/

const isType = type => ([k, v]) => type.length == 0 || type.includes(v.Type);
const isTier = tier => ([k, v]) => tier.length == 0 || tier.includes(v.Tier);
const toggleFilter = e => {
	// List専用
	const selectType = [...document.querySelectorAll("[name=selectType]:checked")].flatMap(e => e.value.split(","));
	const selectTier = [...document.querySelectorAll("[name=selectTier]:checked")].flatMap(e => e.value.split(","));
	const target = [...ListMap].filter(isType(selectType)).filter(isTier(selectTier));
	console.log(target);
}

//
const changeDonate = async e => {
	const me = e.currentTarget;
	const {Name, i} = me.dataset;
	const _default = {Name, Donate: [false, false, false, false, false]};
	const item = await CheckItemDB.get(name) ?? _default;
	item.Donate[i] = !item.Donate[i];
	CheckItemDB.put(item);
}

// 実行開始
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", startup)

<main>
	<div class="flexwrap gap10">
		<div class="toggle-button changeModeTarget ModeA">
			<label><input type="radio" class="changeContainer" name="Container" value="Type" checked><span class="tglbutton">タイプ別表示</span></label>

			<label><input type="radio" class="toggleFilter" name="Rarity" value="Rarity0" checked><span class="tglbutton rarity0">普通</span></label>
			<label><input type="radio" class="toggleFilter" name="Rarity" value="Rarity1"><span class="tglbutton rarity1">上級</span></label>
			<label><input type="radio" class="toggleFilter" name="Rarity" value="Rarity2"><span class="tglbutton rarity2">上質</span></label>

	<div class="changeModeTarget ModeZ">
		<div class="information mt5 HideA HideB HideC HideD HideE HideF">
			はじめに<br>
			このツールはショップタイタンでアイテム販売を行う際のあれこれを補助する目的で作成しました<br>
			「このティア10の上級って半額売り？倍額売り？」「このアイテム融合予定だったかな？コレクション確認しなきゃ」といった悩みを解決します<br>
			<br>
			なお個人利用のため作ったものを気まぐれでアップしているだけなので勝手に拡散するのはおやめください<br>
			諸事情により急遽公開を中止する可能性があることもご了承ください<br>
			このツールの結果に従った結果、損失が出たとしても責任はとりません<br>
			鵜呑みにせず自分でも計算してみてくださいね（そしてバグがあれば教えてください）<br>
		</div>
		<div class="information mt5 HideA HideB HideC HideD HideE HideF">
			販売補助について<br>
			NPC販売の割引販売・追加料金販売のエネルギー換算率を判定しお得な販売方法を表示します<br>
			凡例）‐：通常販売推奨　半：割引販売推奨　倍：追加料金販売推奨　王：王様献上品<br>
			※赤字表示は未寄付アイテムです　品質が上のものが赤字の場合は融合すべきか検討してください<br>
			※最大エネルギーが追加販売に必要なエネルギーに足りていないものは"‐"表記となります<br>
			※マーク部分をクリックすると"？"表記となります<br>
			　マーケット売りしたほうが得になりそうなものにチェックしてください<br>
			　もう一度クリックすると解除されます<br>
		</div>
		<div class="information mt5 HideA HideB HideC HideD HideE HideF">
			仕入補助について<br>
			マーケットでアイテムを仕入れる際に損をしない仕入れ値を計算して表示します<br>
			わざわざ仕入れたものは追加料金販売をすると思いますのでエネルギー換算率の低いものは表示対象外です<br>
			追加料金販売金額から追加販売に必要なコストを引いているのでこれ以下で仕入れれば損はしないはず<br>
		</div>
		<div class="information mt5 HideA HideB HideC HideD HideE HideF">
			付与補助について<br>
			アイテムにエンチャントした際の価格変化を表示します<br>
			黒字はエンチャント後の金額がエンチャント価格と同じもの、赤字はそれより増額、赤字はそれより減額です<br>
			グレイ表記は倍売りできない、または換算率の悪いものです<br>
			<br>
			取り急ぎ実装しましたのでバグなどありましたら報告してください<br>
		</div>
		<div class="information mt5 HideA HideB HideC HideD HideE HideF">
			開発進捗・寄付管理について<br>
			各アイテムの開発進捗と寄付状況を管理します<br>
			チェックを付けると販売補助や仕入補助の計算値がそれを考慮したものとなります<br>
			お気に入りは未寄付品は販売補助で赤字表示されるところ<br>
		</div>
		<div class="information mt5 HideA HideB HideC HideD HideE HideF">
			進化進捗管理について<br>
			進化の軌跡を管理します<br>
			チェックを付けると販売補助や仕入補助の計算値がそれを考慮したものとなります<br>
			と言いたいところですけど実は種類ごとの価格アップ対応できてません<br>
			そこまで進化を進めた種類がないので検証できないんです<br>
			タイタンの全価格１％アップと同じように単純に販売価格に倍率含めて計算すればいいのかな？<br>
			タイタン２つ、種類別価格アップ１つなら追加料金販売金額は販売金額×(2＋0.02＋0.05）?<br>
		</div>
		<div class="information mt5 HideA HideB HideC HideD HideE HideF">
			今後の構想について<br>
			・最優先で付与補助機能の実装<br>
			・販売補助にエンチャントしたときの価格変化対応機能<br>
			・"？"表記を別表で一覧表示して、マーケット売りの"マ"、ジェム売りの"Ｇ"などに表記を切り替える機能<br>
			・仕入補助に別の仕入ロジックへの表示切替機能（アイディア求む）<br>
			　単純に追加料金販売金額への表示切替機能もあったほうが良い？<br>
			・起動時に表示がガツンと切り替わるところや初回表示の重さをなんとかしたいところ<br>
		</div>
		<div class="information mt5 HideA HideB HideC HideD HideE HideF">
			更新履歴<br>
			2021/07/24 こっそり公開開始<br>
			2021/07/25 説明ページを新設、付与補助機能の実装、細かい修正をいくつか<br>
		</div>
	</div>

</main>

.f-container {
	display: flex;
}
.GroupContainer {
	border: 1px solid #000;
}
.reject {
	display: none;
}
.tier {
	text-align: right;
	padding-right: 5px;
}
.tier:after {
	content: ".";
}
.width_200px {
	width: 200px;
	white-space: nowrap;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
	overflow: hidden;
}
</style>
<script>

const dataMap = new Map([
	["dataA1", {Name: "dataA1", X: 1, Y: "A", Z: 101, Flg: true}],
	["dataA2", {Name: "dataA2", X: 2, Y: "A", Z: 102, Flg: false}],
	["dataA3", {Name: "dataA3", X: 3, Y: "A", Z: 103, Flg: false}],
	["dataB1", {Name: "dataB1", X: 1, Y: "B", Z: 201, Flg: false}],
	["dataB2", {Name: "dataB2", X: 2, Y: "B", Z: 202, Flg: false}],
	["dataB3", {Name: "dataB3", X: 3, Y: "B", Z: 203, Flg: true}],
	["dataC1", {Name: "dataC1", X: 1, Y: "C", Z: 301, Flg: false}],
	["dataC2", {Name: "dataC2", X: 2, Y: "C", Z: 302, Flg: false}],
	["dataC3", {Name: "dataC3", X: 3, Y: "C", Z: 303, Flg: false}],
]);

const startup = () => {
	[...dataMap].map(([k, v]) => {
		setBind(k, v);
	});

	document.querySelectorAll(".toggleGroup").forEach(e => e.addEventListener("change", toggleGroup));
	document.querySelector("[name=Group]").dispatchEvent(new Event("change"));
	document.querySelectorAll(".toggleFilter").forEach(e => e.addEventListener("change", toggleFilter));
	document.querySelector("[name=X]").dispatchEvent(new Event("change"));

	document.querySelectorAll(".changeData").forEach(e => e.addEventListener("change", changeData));

//	const width_tier = Math.max(...[...document.querySelectorAll(".tier")].map(e => e.offsetWidth));
//	[...document.querySelectorAll(".tier")].map(e => e.style.width = `${width_tier}px`);

	dataMap.set("dataA1", {Name: "dataA1", X: 1, Y: "A", Z: 999});
	dataMap.set("dataB2", {Name: "dataB2", X: 2, Y: "B", Z: 500});
	setBind("dataA1", dataMap.get("dataA1"));
	setBind("dataB2", dataMap.get("dataB2"));
}
const changeData = e => {
	const {key, property, i} = e.currentTarget.dataset;
	const newData = dataMap.get(key);
	newData[property] = e.currentTarget.checked;
	dataMap.set(key, newData);
	setBind(key, newData);
}
const setBind = (k, v) => {
	document.querySelectorAll(`.bind-parent[data-filter="${k}"]`).forEach(parent => {
		parent.querySelectorAll(`.bind`).forEach(child => {
			const property = child.dataset.property;
			const i = child.dataset.i;
			const value = i == undefined ? v[property] : v[property][i];
			(typeof value == "boolean") ? child.checked = value : child.textContent = `${value}`;
		});
	});
}
const toggleGroup = () => {
	const group = document.querySelector("[name=Group]:checked").value;
	document.querySelectorAll(".toggleGroupTarget").forEach(e => (e.classList.contains(group)) ? e.classList.remove("reject") : e.classList.add("reject"));
}
const toggleFilter = () => {
	const xList = [...document.querySelectorAll("[name=X]:checked")].map(e => e.value).map(Number);
	const yList = [...document.querySelectorAll("[name=Y]:checked")].flatMap(e => e.value.split(","));
	document.querySelectorAll(".toggleFilterTarget").forEach(e => e.classList.add("reject"));
	[...dataMap].filter(([k, v]) => {
		if(xList.length && !xList.includes(v.X)) return;
		if(yList.length && !yList.includes(v.Y)) return;
		return true;
	}).forEach(([k, v]) => {
		document.querySelectorAll(`.toggleFilterTarget[data-filter="${k}"]`).forEach(e => e.classList.remove("reject"));
	});
	document.querySelectorAll(`.GroupContainer`).forEach(e => {
		(e.querySelectorAll(".toggleFilterTarget:not(.reject)").length) ? e.classList.remove("reject") : e.classList.add("reject");
	});
}
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", startup);
</script>
<div>
	<label><input type="radio" name="Group" class="toggleGroup" value="GroupA" checked>グループ別</label>
	<label><input type="radio" name="Group" class="toggleGroup" value="GroupB">タイプ別</label>
<div>

	<label><input type="checkbox" name="X" class="toggleFilter" value="2" checked>２</label>
	<label><input type="checkbox" name="X" class="toggleFilter" value="3" checked>３</label>
<div>

	<label><input type="radio" name="Y" class="toggleFilter" value="A,B,C" checked>ＡＬＬ</label>
	<label><input type="radio" name="Y" class="toggleFilter" value="A">Ａ</label>
	<label><input type="radio" name="Y" class="toggleFilter" value="B">Ｂ</label>
	<label><input type="radio" name="Y" class="toggleFilter" value="C">Ｃ</label>

		<div class="f-container toggleFilterTarget bind-parent" data-filter="dataC3"><span class="width_200px">dataC3 aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa</span><span class="bind" data-key="dataC3" data-property="Z"></span><input type="checkbox" class="bind changeData" data-key="dataC3" data-property="Flg"></div>

<style>
[slot=item]>:nth-of-type(2n) {
	background: #eee;
}
</style>
<script>
const ListMap = new Map([
	["B0301", {Name: "B0301", Type: "B", Tier: "3", Value: 20000}],
	["B0201", {Name: "B0201", Type: "B", Tier: "2", Value: 2000}],
	["B0101", {Name: "B0101", Type: "B", Tier: "1", Value: 200}],
	["A0101", {Name: "A0101", Type: "A", Tier: "1", Value: 100}],
	["A0201", {Name: "A0201", Type: "A", Tier: "2", Value: 1000}],
	["A0301", {Name: "A0301", Type: "A", Tier: "3", Value: 10000}],
]);

const startup = () => {
	[...ListMap].forEach(([k, v]) => {
		v.NowValue = v.Value * 1.5;
	});

	const isType = type => ([k, v]) => type.length == 0 || type.includes(v.Type);
	const isTier = tier => ([k, v]) => tier.length == 0 || tier.includes(v.Tier);
	// 抽出やグループ化
	const key = "Type";
//	const key = "Tier";
	const target = [...ListMap].filter(isType([])).filter(isTier([])).reduce((result, [k, v]) => {
		if(!(v[key] in result)) result[v[key]] = [];
		result[v[key]].push(v);
		return result;
	}, {});

	// 画面要素設定
	const parent = $viewList;
	const temp_group = parent.querySelector(".host_group").content;
	const temp_item = temp_group.querySelector(".host_item").content;
	const fragment = new DocumentFragment();
	Object.entries(target).forEach(([k, v]) => {
		// グループ設定
		const group = temp_group.cloneNode(true);
		const group_root = group.querySelector("div");
		const slot_group = group.querySelector("[slot=group]");
		slot_group.textContent = k;
		const item_root = group.querySelector("[slot=item]");
		// アイテム設定
		v.forEach(data => {
			const item = temp_item.cloneNode(true);
			const item_div = item.querySelector("div");
			Object.keys(data).forEach(key => {
				const span = document.createElement("span");
				span.setAttribute("slot", key);
				span.textContent = data[key];
				item_div.appendChild(span);
			});
			item_root.appendChild(item);
		});
		fragment.appendChild(group);
	});
	parent.appendChild(fragment);

	const shadow_group = document.querySelector(`#shadow_group`).content;
	parent.querySelectorAll(".attach_group").forEach(host => {
		const root = host.attachShadow({mode: "open"})
			.appendChild(shadow_group.cloneNode(true));
	});

	const shadow_item = document.querySelector(`#shadow_item_value`).content;
//	const shadow_item = document.querySelector(`#shadow_item_nowvalue`).content;
	parent.querySelectorAll(".attach_item").forEach(host => {
		const root = host.attachShadow({mode: "open"})
			.appendChild(shadow_item.cloneNode(true));
	});
}

document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", startup)
</script>

<div id="$viewList">
<template class="host_group">
	<div class="attach_group">
		<span slot="group"></span>
		<div slot="item"></div>
<template class="host_item">
			<div class="attach_item"></div>
</template>
		</div>
	</div>
</template>
</div>

<template id="shadow_group">
<div>
	<div>
		<slot name="group"></slot>
		<slot name="item"></slot>
	</div>
</div>
</template>

<template id="shadow_item_value">
<link rel="stylesheet" href="shadow.css">
<div class="flex">
	<span class="tier"><slot name="Tier"></slot></span>
	<span class="name"><slot name="Name"></slot></span>
	<span class="value"><slot name="Value"></slot></span>
</div>
</template>

<template id="shadow_item_nowvalue">
<link rel="stylesheet" href="shadow.css">
<div class="flex">
	<span class="tier"><slot name="Tier"></slot></span>
	<span class="name"><slot name="Name"></slot></span>
	<span class="value"><slot name="NowValue"></slot></span>
</div>
</template>
<!-- shadow.css
.flex {
	display: flex;
}
.name {
	width: 20px;
	color: #f00;
border: 1px solid #f00;
}

.tier::after {
	content: ".";
}

// □イベント処理
const changeMode = () => {
	console.log("changeMode");
	const mode = document.querySelector("[name=Mode]:checked").value;
	document.querySelectorAll("[class*='Disabled']").forEach(e => e.disabled = e.classList.contains(`Disabled${mode}`));
	document.querySelectorAll("[class*='Hide']").forEach(e => {
		if(e.classList.contains(`Hide${mode}`)) {
			e.classList.add("hide");
		} else {
			e.classList.remove("hide");
		}
	});
	resizeWindow();
}
const showList = () => {
	$List.querySelectorAll(".cloned").forEach(e => e.parentNode.removeChild(e));
	const filter = setFilter();
console.log(filter);
	const mode = document.querySelector("[name=Mode]:checked").value;
	const callback = {
		A: showModeA,
		B: showModeB,
		C: showModeC,
		D: showModeD,
		E: showModeE,
		F: showModeF
	}
	callback[mode](filter);
}
const setFilter = () => {
	const Container = document.querySelector("[name=Container]:checked").value;
	const inRack = document.querySelector("[name=Rack]:checked")?.value;
	const Type = inRack
		? mapRack.get(inRack).Type
		: [...mapType].map(([k, v]) => k)
	;
	const inGroupTier = document.querySelector("[name=groupTier]:checked")?.value;
	const Tier = inGroupTier
		? [...Array(11)].map((_, i) => ++i)
		: [...document.querySelectorAll("[name=Tier]:checked")].map(e => +e.value)
	;
	const Rarity = document.querySelector("[name=Rarity]:checked")?.value;
	const sMaxEnergy = $MaxEnergy.value;
	const sCounterEnergy = $CounterEnergy.value;
	const sDiscount = $Discount.value;
	const sSurchage = $Surchage.value;
	const sForKing = $ForKing.value;
	const sElementValue = $ElementValue.value;
	const sSpiritValue = $SpiritValue.value;
	const Donated = document.querySelector("[name=Donated]:checked")?.value;
//	const ValueUp = $ValueUp.checked;
//	const Learner = $Learner.checked;
	const [MaxEnergy, CounterEnergy, Discount, Surchage, ForKing, ElementValue, SpiritValue] = string2number(sMaxEnergy, sCounterEnergy, sDiscount, sSurchage, sForKing, sElementValue, sSpiritValue);

//	return {Container, Type, Tier, Rarity, MaxEnergy, CounterEnergy, Discount, Surchage, ForKing, ElementValue, SpiritValue, Donated, ValueUp, Learner};
	return {Container, Type, Tier, Rarity, MaxEnergy, CounterEnergy, Discount, Surchage, ForKing, ElementValue, SpiritValue, Donated};
}
const showModeA = filter => {
	const {Container, Type, Tier, Discount, Surchage, ForKing, MaxEnergy} = filter;

	const list = [...mapItem].filter(([k, v]) => {
		if(v.Type == "Stone") return false;
		if(v.Type == "Enchantment") return false;
		if(!Type.includes(v.Type)) return false;
		if(!Tier.includes(v.Tier)) return false;
		return true;
	}).reduce((result, [k, v]) => {
		const key = Container == "Type" ? v.Type : v.Tier;
		if(!result.hasOwnProperty(key)) result[key] = [];
		result[key].push(v);
		return result;
	}, {});

	const AllValueUp = [...mapCheckType].filter(([k, v]) => v.AllValueUp).length;

	const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
	const map = Container == "Type" ? mapType : mapTier;
	for (const [k, v] of map) {
		if(!list.hasOwnProperty(k)) continue;

		const child = clone($ModeA_group);
		const div = child.querySelector("div");
		const span = child.querySelector("span");
		span.appendChild(addText(`${v.LocalType ?? v.LocalTier}`));

		for (const v2 of list[k]) {
			const child2 = clone($ModeA_data);
			const span2 = child2.querySelector("span");
			span2.appendChild(addText(`${v2.Tier}.${v2.LocalName}`));

			const {Value, GetE, UseE, Keep, Owned, Donation} = getItemInfo(v2);

			const e = child2.querySelectorAll(".Keep");
			e.forEach((v3, i) => {
				const nowValue = roundValue(Value * Magnification[i]);
				const surchageValue = nowValue * (2 + 0.01 * AllValueUp);
				const discountValuePerEnergy = Math.floor(nowValue / 2 / GetE);
				const surchageValuePerEnergy = Math.floor((surchageValue - nowValue) / UseE);
				let sell = "－";
				if(discountValuePerEnergy <= Discount) sell = "半";
				if(surchageValuePerEnergy >= Surchage && MaxEnergy >= UseE) sell = "倍";
				if(i != 0 && nowValue >= ForKing) sell = "王";

				v3.appendChild(addText(`${sell}`));
				v3.dataset.Name = v2.Name;
				v3.dataset.i = i;
				if(Owned && !Donation?.[i]) v3.classList.add("caution");
				if(Keep?.[i]) v3.classList.toggle("onkeep");
				v3.addEventListener("click", changeKeep);
				v3.setAttribute("description", tagLocalNumber`通常価格 ${nowValue} 追加料金価格 ${surchageValue}\n割引販売エネルギー ${GetE}(１エネルギーを得るのに消費する金額 ${discountValuePerEnergy})\n追加料金販売エネルギー ${UseE}(１エネルギを消費して得る金額 ${surchageValuePerEnergy})`);
			});
			div.appendChild(child2);
		}
		fragment.appendChild(child);
	}
	$List.appendChild(fragment);
}
const getItemInfo = Item => {
	const {Name, Type} = Item;
	const CheckItem = mapCheckItem.get(Name);
	const CheckKeep = mapCheckKeep.get(Name);
	const CheckType = mapCheckType.get(Type);

	const Value = CheckItem?.ValueUp ? Item.Value2 : Item.Value;
	const GetE = Item.GetE;
	const UseE = CheckType?.CostDown ? Item.UseE2 : Item.UseE;
	const Keep = CheckKeep?.Keep;
	const Owned = CheckItem?.Owned;
	const ValueUp = CheckItem?.ValueUp;
	const Donation = CheckItem?.Donation;

	return {Value, GetE, UseE, Keep, Owned, ValueUp, Donation};
}
const showModeB = filter => {
	const {Container, Type, Tier, Discount, Surchage, MaxEnergy, Rarity} = filter;
	const AllValueUp = [...mapCheckType].filter(([k, v]) => v.AllValueUp).length;

	const list = [...mapItem].filter(([k, v]) => {
		if(v.Type == "Stone") return false;
		if(v.Type == "Enchantment") return false;
		if(!Type.includes(v.Type)) return false;
		if(!Tier.includes(v.Tier)) return false;
		return true;
	}).reduce((result, [k, v]) => {
		const temp = {...v};
		const {ValueUp} = mapCheckItem.get(temp.Name) ?? {ValueUp: false};
		const {CostDown} = mapCheckType.get(temp.Type) ?? {CostDown: false};
		const NowValue = ValueUp ? temp.Value2 : temp.Value;
		const NowValue2 = roundValue(NowValue * Magnification[Rarity]);
		const NowUseE = CostDown ? temp.UseE2 : temp.UseE;
		if(MaxEnergy < NowUseE) return result;
		const discountValuePerEnergy = Math.floor(NowValue2 / 2 / temp.GetE);
		if(discountValuePerEnergy <= Discount) return result;
		const surchageValue = NowValue2 * (2 + 0.01 * AllValueUp);
		const surchageValuePerEnergy = Math.floor(surchageValue / NowUseE);
		temp.PurchaseValue = surchageValue - (Discount * temp.UseE);
		temp.surchageValue = surchageValue;
		temp.notSurchage = (MaxEnergy < NowUseE || (surchageValue - NowValue2) / NowUseE < Surchage);
		const key = Container == "Type" ? temp.Type : temp.Tier;
		if(!result.hasOwnProperty(key)) result[key] = [];
		result[key].push(temp);
		return result;
	}, {});

	const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
	const map = Container == "Type" ? mapType : mapTier;
	for (const [k, v] of map) {
		if(!list.hasOwnProperty(k)) continue;

		const child = clone($ModeB_group);
		const div = child.querySelector("div");
		const span = child.querySelector("span");
		span.appendChild(addText(`${v.LocalType ?? v.LocalTier}`));

		for (const v2 of list[k]) {
			const child2 = clone($ModeB_data);
			const span2 = child2.querySelectorAll("span");
			span2[0].appendChild(addText(`${v2.Tier}.${v2.LocalName}`));
			span2[1].appendChild(addText(tagLocalNumber`${v2.PurchaseValue}`));
			span2[1].parentNode.setAttribute("description", tagLocalNumber`追加料金価格－（１エネルギーを得るのに消費する金額×追加料金販売エネルギー）\n${v2.surchageValue} - (${Discount} * ${v2.UseE})`);
			if(v2.notSurchage) {
				span2[0].classList.add("gray");
				span2[1].classList.add("gray");
			}

			div.appendChild(child2);
		}
		fragment.appendChild(child);
	}
	$List.appendChild(fragment);
}
const showModeC = filter => {
	const {Container, Type, Tier, Discount, Surchage, MaxEnergy, Rarity, ElementValue, SpiritValue} = filter;

	const list = [...mapItem].filter(([k, v]) => {
		if(v.Type == "Stone") return false;
		if(v.Type == "Enchantment") return false;
		if(!Type.includes(v.Type)) return false;
		if(!Tier.includes(v.Tier)) return false;
		return true;
	}).reduce((result, [k, v]) => {
		if(v.EnchantedE && ElementValue != 0) return result;
		if(v.EnchantedS && SpiritValue != 0) return result;

		const temp = {...v};
		const {ValueUp} = mapCheckItem.get(temp.Name) ?? {ValueUp: false};
		const {CostDown} = mapCheckType.get(temp.Type) ?? {CostDown: false};
		const NowValue = ValueUp ? temp.Value2 : temp.Value;
		const NowUseE = CostDown ? temp.UseE2 : temp.UseE;
		const NowValue2 = roundValue(NowValue * Magnification[Rarity]);
		const EnchantedValue = NowValue + Math.min(NowValue, ElementValue) + Math.min(NowValue, SpiritValue);
		const EnchantedValue2 = roundValue(EnchantedValue * Magnification[Rarity]);
		const EnchantValue = (ElementValue + SpiritValue) * Magnification[Rarity];
		const DifferenceValue = EnchantedValue2 - NowValue2;
		const GorL = DifferenceValue - EnchantValue;
		temp.DifferenceValue = DifferenceValue;
		temp.GorL = GorL;
		temp.notSurchage = (MaxEnergy < NowUseE || EnchantedValue2 / NowUseE < Surchage);

		const key = Container == "Type" ? temp.Type : temp.Tier;
		if(!result.hasOwnProperty(key)) result[key] = [];
		result[key].push(temp);
		return result;
	}, {});


	const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
	const map = Container == "Type" ? mapType : mapTier;
	for (const [k, v] of map) {
		if(!list.hasOwnProperty(k)) continue;

		const child = clone($ModeC_group);
		const div = child.querySelector("div");
		const span = child.querySelector("span");
		span.appendChild(addText(`${v.LocalType ?? v.LocalTier}`));

		for (const v2 of list[k]) {
			const child2 = clone($ModeC_data);
			const span2 = child2.querySelectorAll("span");
			span2[0].appendChild(addText(`${v2.Tier}.${v2.LocalName}`));
			span2[1].appendChild(addText(tagLocalNumber`${v2.DifferenceValue}`));
			if(v2.GorL > 0) span2[1].parentNode.classList.add("gains");
			if(v2.GorL < 0) span2[1].parentNode.classList.add("losses");
			if(v2.notSurchage) span2[1].parentNode.classList.add("gray");

			div.appendChild(child2);
		}
		fragment.appendChild(child);
	}
	$List.appendChild(fragment);
}
const showModeD = filter => {
	const {Container, Type, Tier, Donated} = filter;

	const list = [...mapItem].filter(([k, v]) => {
		if(v.Type == "Stone") return false;
		if(!Type.includes(v.Type)) return false;
		if(!Tier.includes(v.Tier)) return false;
		return true;
	}).reduce((result, [k, v]) => {
		const key = Container == "Type" ? v.Type : v.Tier;
		if(!result.hasOwnProperty(key)) result[key] = [];
		result[key].push(v);
		return result;
	}, {});

	const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
	const map = Container == "Type" ? mapType : mapTier;
	for (const [k, v] of map) {
		if(!list.hasOwnProperty(k)) continue;

		const child = clone($ModeD_group);
		const div = child.querySelector("div");
		const span = child.querySelector("span");
		span.appendChild(addText(`${v.LocalType ?? v.LocalTier}`));

		let flg = false;
		for (const v2 of list[k]) {
			const child2 = clone($ModeD_data);
			const span2 = child2.querySelector("span");
			const checkbox = child2.querySelectorAll("input");

			const {Value, Owned, ValueUp, Donation} = getItemInfo(v2);
			if(Donation?.[Donated]) continue;
			flg = true;

			span2.dataset.Name = v2.Name;
			span2.appendChild(addText(`${v2.Tier}.${v2.LocalName}`));

			checkbox[0].dataset.Name = v2.Name;
			checkbox[0].dataset.key = "Owned";
			checkbox[0].checked = Owned;
			checkbox[0].addEventListener("change", chengeCheckItem);

			checkbox[1].dataset.Name = v2.Name;
			checkbox[1].dataset.key = "ValueUp";
			checkbox[1].checked = ValueUp;
			checkbox[1].addEventListener("change", chengeCheckItem);
			if(v2.Type == "Enchantment") {
				checkbox[1].classList.add("hide2");
				checkbox[1].parentNode.classList.add("hide2");
			}

			const e = child2.querySelectorAll(".Donation");
			e.forEach((v3, i) => {
				v3.dataset.Name = v2.Name;
				v3.dataset.key = "Donation";
				v3.dataset.i = i;
				if(Donation?.[i]) v3.checked = true;
				v3.addEventListener("change", chengeCheckItem);
			});

			div.appendChild(child2);
		};
		if(flg) fragment.appendChild(child);
	};
	$List.appendChild(fragment);
}
const showModeE = filter => {
	const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
	for (const [k, v] of mapTypeGroup) {
		const child = clone($ModeE_group);
		const div = child.querySelector("div");
		const span = child.querySelector("span");
		span.appendChild(addText(`${v.LocalTypeGroup}`));

		for (const v2 of v.Type) {
			const {LocalType, CostDown, TypeValueUp, AllValueUp} = getTypeInfo(v2);

			const child2 = clone($ModeE_data);
			const span2 = child2.querySelector("span");
			const checkbox = child2.querySelectorAll("input");

			span2.appendChild(addText(`${LocalType}`));

			checkbox[0].dataset.Type = v2;
			checkbox[0].dataset.key = "CostDown";
			checkbox[0].checked = CostDown;
			checkbox[0].addEventListener("change", chengeCheckType);

			checkbox[1].dataset.Type = v2;
			checkbox[1].dataset.key = "TypeValueUp";
			checkbox[1].checked = TypeValueUp;
			checkbox[1].addEventListener("change", chengeCheckType);

			checkbox[2].dataset.Type = v2;
			checkbox[2].dataset.key = "AllValueUp";
			checkbox[2].checked = AllValueUp;
			checkbox[2].addEventListener("change", chengeCheckType);

			if(v2 == "Stone" || v2 == "Element" || v2 == "Spirit") {
				checkbox[0].classList.add("hide2");
				checkbox[0].parentNode.classList.add("hide2");
				checkbox[1].classList.add("hide2");
				checkbox[1].parentNode.classList.add("hide2");
			}
			div.appendChild(child2);
		}
		fragment.appendChild(child);
	}
	$List.appendChild(fragment);
}
const getTypeInfo = Type => {
	const {LocalType} = mapType.get(Type);
	const {CostDown, TypeValueUp, AllValueUp} = mapCheckType.get(Type);
	return {LocalType, CostDown, TypeValueUp, AllValueUp};
}
const showModeF = async filter => {
	const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
	const Container = document.querySelector("[name=Container]:checked").value;
	const donation = document.querySelector("[name=Donation]:checked").value;
	const map = Container == "Type" ? mapType : mapTier;
	map.forEach(v => {
		const child = clone($ModeF_group);
		const div = child.querySelector("div");
		const span = child.querySelector("span");
		span.appendChild(addText(`${v.LocalType ?? v.LocalTier}`));

		let flg = false;
		mapItem.forEach(v2 => {
			if(!filter.type.includes(v2.Type)) return;
			if(!filter.tier.includes(v2.Tier)) return;
			if(v.Type != v2.Type && v.Tier != v2.Tier) return;
			flg = true;

			const child2 = clone($ModeF_data);
			const span2 = child2.querySelectorAll("span");
			span2[0].appendChild(addText(`${v2.Tier}.${v2.LocalName}`));
			span2[1].appendChild(addText(tagLocalNumber`${v2.Value}`));
			span2[1].dataset.value1 = tagLocalNumber`${v2.Value}`;
			span2[1].dataset.value2 = tagLocalNumber`${roundValue(v2.Value2)}`;
			span2[1].dataset.value3 = tagLocalNumber`${v2.GetE}`;
			span2[1].dataset.value4 = tagLocalNumber`${v2.UseE}`;
			span2[1].dataset.value5 = tagLocalNumber`${v2.UseE2}`;

			div.appendChild(child2);
		});
		if(flg) fragment.appendChild(child);
	});
	$List.appendChild(fragment);
}
const clone = e => document.importNode(e.content, true);
const addText = str => document.createTextNode(str);
const roundValue = value => {
	let                  x = 50000;
	if(value <= 1000000) x =  5000;
	if(value <=  100000) x =   500;
	if(value <=   10000) x =    50;
	if(value <=    1000) x =    10;
	return Math.round(value / x) * x;
}
const tagLocalNumber = (sList, ...vList) => {
	const LocalValue = v => {
		return v.toLocaleString();
	}
	return vList
		.map((v, i) => sList[i] + LocalValue(v))
		.concat(sList.slice(vList.length))
		.join("")
	;
}
const switch1 = () => document.querySelectorAll(".switch1").forEach(e => e.classList.value = `switch1 ${document.querySelector("[name=switch1]:checked").value}`);
const chengeCheckItem = async e => {
	const me = e.currentTarget;
	const Name = me.dataset.Name;
	const key = me.dataset.key;
	const i = me.dataset.i;
	const checked = me.checked;

	const _default = {Name, Owned: false, ValueUp: false, Donation: [false, false, false, false, false]};
	const CheckItem = await dbCheckItem.get(Name) ?? _default;
	if(i) {
		CheckItem[key][i] = checked;
	} else {
		CheckItem[key] = checked;
	}

	const parent = me.parentNode.parentNode;
	if(!checked && key == "Owned") {
		parent.querySelector("[data-key=ValueUp]").checked = CheckItem.ValueUp = false;
		parent.querySelector("[data-i='0']").checked = CheckItem.Donation[0] = false;
		parent.querySelector("[data-i='1']").checked = CheckItem.Donation[1] = false;
		parent.querySelector("[data-i='2']").checked = CheckItem.Donation[2] = false;
		parent.querySelector("[data-i='3']").checked = CheckItem.Donation[3] = false;
		parent.querySelector("[data-i='4']").checked = CheckItem.Donation[4] = false;
	}
	if(!checked && key == "ValueUp") {
		parent.querySelector("[data-i='0']").checked = CheckItem.Donation[0] = false;
		parent.querySelector("[data-i='1']").checked = CheckItem.Donation[1] = false;
		parent.querySelector("[data-i='2']").checked = CheckItem.Donation[2] = false;
		parent.querySelector("[data-i='3']").checked = CheckItem.Donation[3] = false;
		parent.querySelector("[data-i='4']").checked = CheckItem.Donation[4] = false;
	}
	if(checked && key == "ValueUp") {
		parent.querySelector("[data-key=Owned]").checked = CheckItem.Owned = true;
	}
	if(checked && key == "Donation") {
		parent.querySelector("[data-key=Owned]").checked = CheckItem.Owned = true;
		parent.querySelector("[data-key=ValueUp]").checked = CheckItem.ValueUp = true;
	}
	mapCheckItem.set(CheckItem.Name, CheckItem);
	dbCheckItem.put(CheckItem);
}
const chengeCheckType = async e => {
	const me = e.currentTarget;
	const Type = me.dataset.Type;
	const key = me.dataset.key;
	const checked = me.checked;

	const _default = {Type, CostDown: false, TypeValueUp: false, AllValueUp: false};
	const CheckType = await dbCheckType.get(Type) ?? _default;
	CheckType[key] = checked;

	const parent = me.parentNode.parentNode;
	if(!checked && key == "CostDown") {
		parent.querySelector("[data-key=TypeValueUp]").checked = CheckType.TypeValueUp = false;
		parent.querySelector("[data-key=AllValueUp]").checked = CheckType.AllValueUp = false;
	}
	if(!checked && key == "TypeValueUp") {
		parent.querySelector("[data-key=AllValueUp]").checked = CheckType.AllValueUp = false;
	}
	if(checked && key == "TypeValueUp") {
		parent.querySelector("[data-key=CostDown]").checked = CheckType.CostDown = true;
	}
	if(checked && key == "AllValueUp") {
		parent.querySelector("[data-key=CostDown]").checked = CheckType.CostDown = true;
		parent.querySelector("[data-key=TypeValueUp]").checked = CheckType.TypeValueUp = true;
	}
	mapCheckType.set(Type, CheckType);
	dbCheckType.put(CheckType);
}
const changeKeep = async e => {
	const me = e.currentTarget;
	const Name = me.dataset.Name;
	const i = me.dataset.i;

	me.classList.toggle("onkeep");

	const _default = {Name, Keep: [false, false, false, false, false]};
	const CheckKeep = await dbCheckKeep.get(Name) ?? _default;
	CheckKeep.Keep[i] = !CheckKeep.Keep[i];
	mapCheckKeep.set(CheckKeep.Name, CheckKeep);
	dbCheckKeep.put(CheckKeep);
}

// 実行開始
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", startup);
// 関数宣言
// □起動処理
const startup = async () => {
	const width_tier = Math.max(...[...document.querySelectorAll(".tier")].map(e => e.offsetWidth));
	[...document.querySelectorAll(".tier")].map(e => e.style.width = `${width_tier}px`);

	const width_roundnowvalue = Math.max(...[...document.querySelectorAll(".roundnowvalue")].map(e => e.offsetWidth));
	[...document.querySelectorAll(".roundnowvalue")].map(e => e.style.width = `${width_roundnowvalue}px`);

	for(const e of document.querySelectorAll("[type=text]")) e.addEventListener("focus", e => {
		const me = e.currentTarget;
		me.value = e.currentTarget.value.replaceAll(",", "");
		me.select();
	});
	for(const e of document.querySelectorAll("[type=text]")) e.addEventListener("blur", async e => {
		const me = e.currentTarget;
		me.value = isNaN(me.value) ? 0 : (+me.value).toLocaleString();
		await Para.set(me.dataset.para, me.value);
	});

	document.querySelectorAll(".changeMode").forEach(e => e.addEventListener("change", changeMode));

	document.querySelector("[name=Mode]").dispatchEvent(new Event("change"));
//	document.querySelector("[name=switch1]").dispatchEvent(new Event("change"));

	window.addEventListener("resize", resizeWindow);
}

const setBind = (k, v) => {
	document.querySelectorAll(`.bind-parent[data-key="${k}"]`).forEach(parent => {
		parent.querySelectorAll(`.bind`).forEach(child => {
			const property = child.dataset.property;
			const i = child.dataset.i;
			const value = i == undefined ? v[property] : v[property][i];
			(typeof value == "boolean") ? child.checked = value : child.textContent = `${value}`;
		});
	});
}

// □イベント処理
const changeMode = () => {
	const mode = document.querySelector("[name=Mode]:checked").value;
	document.querySelectorAll(".changeModeTarget").forEach(e => (e.classList.contains(mode)) ? e.classList.remove("reject") : e.classList.add("reject"));
	resizeWindow();
}


const showList = () => {
	$List.querySelectorAll(".cloned").forEach(e => e.parentNode.removeChild(e));
	const filter = setFilter();
console.log(filter);
	const mode = document.querySelector("[name=Mode]:checked").value;
	const callback = {
		A: showModeA,
		B: showModeB,
		C: showModeC,
		D: showModeD,
		E: showModeE,
		F: showModeF
	}
	callback[mode](filter);
}
const setFilter = () => {
	const Container = document.querySelector("[name=Container]:checked").value;
	const inRack = document.querySelector("[name=Rack]:checked")?.value;
	const inGroupTier = document.querySelector("[name=groupTier]:checked")?.value;
	const Tier = inGroupTier
		? [...Array(11)].map((_, i) => ++i)
		: [...document.querySelectorAll("[name=Tier]:checked")].map(e => +e.value)
	;
	const Rarity = document.querySelector("[name=Rarity]:checked")?.value;
	const sMaxEnergy = $MaxEnergy.value;
	const sCounterEnergy = $CounterEnergy.value;
	const sDiscount = $Discount.value;
	const sSurchage = $Surchage.value;
	const sForKing = $ForKing.value;
	const sElementValue = $ElementValue.value;
	const sSpiritValue = $SpiritValue.value;
	const Donated = document.querySelector("[name=Donated]:checked")?.value;
//	const ValueUp = $ValueUp.checked;
//	const Learner = $Learner.checked;
	const [MaxEnergy, CounterEnergy, Discount, Surchage, ForKing, ElementValue, SpiritValue] = String2Number(sMaxEnergy, sCounterEnergy, sDiscount, sSurchage, sForKing, sElementValue, sSpiritValue);

//	return {Container, Type, Tier, Rarity, MaxEnergy, CounterEnergy, Discount, Surchage, ForKing, ElementValue, SpiritValue, Donated, ValueUp, Learner};
	return {Container, Type, Tier, Rarity, MaxEnergy, CounterEnergy, Discount, Surchage, ForKing, ElementValue, SpiritValue, Donated};
}
const showModeA = filter => {
	const {Container, Type, Tier, Discount, Surchage, ForKing, MaxEnergy} = filter;

	const list = [...ItemMap].filter(([k, v]) => {
		if(v.Type == "Stone") return false;
		if(v.Type == "Enchantment") return false;
		if(!Type.includes(v.Type)) return false;
		if(!Tier.includes(v.Tier)) return false;
		return true;
	}).reduce((result, [k, v]) => {
		const key = Container == "Type" ? v.Type : v.Tier;
		if(!result.hasOwnProperty(key)) result[key] = [];
		result[key].push(v);
		return result;
	}, {});

	const AllValueUp = [...CheckTypeMap].filter(([k, v]) => v.AllValueUp).length;

	const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
	const map = Container == "Type" ? TypeMap : TierMap;
	for (const [k, v] of map) {
		if(!list.hasOwnProperty(k)) continue;

		const child = clone($ModeA_group);
		const div = child.querySelector("div");
		const span = child.querySelector("span");
		span.appendChild(addText(`${v.LocalType ?? v.LocalTier}`));

		for (const v2 of list[k]) {
			const child2 = clone($ModeA_data);
			const span2 = child2.querySelector("span");
			span2.appendChild(addText(`${v2.Tier}.${v2.LocalName}`));

			const {Value, DiscountEnergy, UseE, Keep, Owned, Donation} = getItemInfo(v2);

			const e = child2.querySelectorAll(".Keep");
			e.forEach((v3, i) => {
				const nowValue = roundValue(Value * ValueWeight[i]);
				const surchageValue = nowValue * (2 + 0.01 * AllValueUp);
				const discountValuePerEnergy = Math.floor(nowValue / 2 / DiscountEnergy);
				const surchageValuePerEnergy = Math.floor((surchageValue - nowValue) / UseE);
				let sell = "－";
				if(discountValuePerEnergy <= Discount) sell = "半";
				if(surchageValuePerEnergy >= Surchage && MaxEnergy >= UseE) sell = "倍";
				if(i != 0 && nowValue >= ForKing) sell = "王";

				v3.appendChild(addText(`${sell}`));
				v3.dataset.Name = v2.Name;
				v3.dataset.i = i;
				if(Owned && !Donation?.[i]) v3.classList.add("caution");
				if(Keep?.[i]) v3.classList.toggle("onkeep");
				v3.addEventListener("click", changeKeep);
//				v3.setAttribute("description", tagLocalNumber`通常価格 ${nowValue} 追加料金価格 ${surchageValue}\n割引販売エネルギー ${GetE}(１エネルギーを得るのに消費する金額 ${discountValuePerEnergy})\n追加料金販売エネルギー ${UseE}(１エネルギを消費して得る金額 ${surchageValuePerEnergy})`);
			});
			div.appendChild(child2);
		}
		fragment.appendChild(child);
	}
	$List.appendChild(fragment);
}
const getItemInfo = Item => {
	const {Name, Type} = Item;
	const CheckItem = CheckItemMap.get(Name);
	const CheckKeep = CheckKeepMap.get(Name);
	const CheckType = CheckTypeMap.get(Type);

	const Value = CheckItem?.ValueUp ? Item.IncreaseValue : Item.Value;
	const DiscountEnergy = Item.DiscountEnergy;
	const UseE = CheckType?.CostDown ? Item.SurchargeEnergyCostDown : Item.SurchargeEnergy;
	const Keep = CheckKeep?.Keep;
	const Owned = CheckItem?.Owned;
	const ValueUp = CheckItem?.ValueUp;
	const Donation = CheckItem?.Donation;

	return {Value, GetE, UseE, Keep, Owned, ValueUp, Donation};
}
const showModeB = filter => {
	const {Container, Type, Tier, Discount, Surchage, MaxEnergy, Rarity} = filter;
	const AllValueUp = [...CheckTypeMap].filter(([k, v]) => v.AllValueUp).length;

	const list = [...ItemMap].filter(([k, v]) => {
		if(v.Type == "Stone") return false;
		if(v.Type == "Enchantment") return false;
		if(!Type.includes(v.Type)) return false;
		if(!Tier.includes(v.Tier)) return false;
		return true;
	}).reduce((result, [k, v]) => {
		const temp = {...v};
		const {ValueUp} = CheckItemMap.get(temp.Name) ?? {ValueUp: false};
		const {CostDown} = CheckTypeMap.get(temp.Type) ?? {CostDown: false};
		const NowValue = ValueUp ? temp.Value2 : temp.Value;
		const NowValue2 = roundValue(NowValue * ValueWeight[Rarity]);
		const NowUseE = CostDown ? temp.UseE2 : temp.UseE;
		if(MaxEnergy < NowUseE) return result;
		const discountValuePerEnergy = Math.floor(NowValue2 / 2 / temp.GetE);
		if(discountValuePerEnergy <= Discount) return result;
		const surchageValue = NowValue2 * (2 + 0.01 * AllValueUp);
		const surchageValuePerEnergy = Math.floor(surchageValue / NowUseE);
		temp.PurchaseValue = surchageValue - (Discount * temp.UseE);
		temp.surchageValue = surchageValue;
		temp.notSurchage = (MaxEnergy < NowUseE || (surchageValue - NowValue2) / NowUseE < Surchage);
		const key = Container == "Type" ? temp.Type : temp.Tier;
		if(!result.hasOwnProperty(key)) result[key] = [];
		result[key].push(temp);
		return result;
	}, {});

	const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
	const map = Container == "Type" ? TypeMap : TierMap;
	for (const [k, v] of map) {
		if(!list.hasOwnProperty(k)) continue;

		const child = clone($ModeB_group);
		const div = child.querySelector("div");
		const span = child.querySelector("span");
		span.appendChild(addText(`${v.LocalType ?? v.LocalTier}`));

		for (const v2 of list[k]) {
			const child2 = clone($ModeB_data);
			const span2 = child2.querySelectorAll("span");
			span2[0].appendChild(addText(`${v2.Tier}.${v2.LocalName}`));
			span2[1].appendChild(addText(tagLocalNumber`${v2.PurchaseValue}`));
//			span2[1].parentNode.setAttribute("description", tagLocalNumber`追加料金価格－（１エネルギーを得るのに消費する金額×追加料金販売エネルギー）\n${v2.surchageValue} - (${Discount} * ${v2.UseE})`);
			if(v2.notSurchage) {
				span2[0].classList.add("gray");
				span2[1].classList.add("gray");
			}

			div.appendChild(child2);
		}
		fragment.appendChild(child);
	}
	$List.appendChild(fragment);
}
const showModeC = filter => {
	const {Container, Type, Tier, Discount, Surchage, MaxEnergy, Rarity, ElementValue, SpiritValue} = filter;

	const list = [...ItemMap].filter(([k, v]) => {
		if(v.Type == "Stone") return false;
		if(v.Type == "Enchantment") return false;
		if(!Type.includes(v.Type)) return false;
		if(!Tier.includes(v.Tier)) return false;
		return true;
	}).reduce((result, [k, v]) => {
		if(v.EnchantedE && ElementValue != 0) return result;
		if(v.EnchantedS && SpiritValue != 0) return result;

		const temp = {...v};
		const {ValueUp} = CheckItemMap.get(temp.Name) ?? {ValueUp: false};
		const {CostDown} = CheckTypeMap.get(temp.Type) ?? {CostDown: false};
		const NowValue = ValueUp ? temp.Value2 : temp.Value;
		const NowUseE = CostDown ? temp.UseE2 : temp.UseE;
		const NowValue2 = roundValue(NowValue * ValueWeight[Rarity]);
		const EnchantedValue = NowValue + Math.min(NowValue, ElementValue) + Math.min(NowValue, SpiritValue);
		const EnchantedValue2 = roundValue(EnchantedValue * ValueWeight[Rarity]);
		const EnchantValue = (ElementValue + SpiritValue) * ValueWeight[Rarity];
		const DifferenceValue = EnchantedValue2 - NowValue2;
		const GorL = DifferenceValue - EnchantValue;
		temp.DifferenceValue = DifferenceValue;
		temp.GorL = GorL;
		temp.notSurchage = (MaxEnergy < NowUseE || EnchantedValue2 / NowUseE < Surchage);

		const key = Container == "Type" ? temp.Type : temp.Tier;
		if(!result.hasOwnProperty(key)) result[key] = [];
		result[key].push(temp);
		return result;
	}, {});


	const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
	const map = Container == "Type" ? TypeMap : TierMap;
	for (const [k, v] of map) {
		if(!list.hasOwnProperty(k)) continue;

		const child = clone($ModeC_group);
		const div = child.querySelector("div");
		const span = child.querySelector("span");
		span.appendChild(addText(`${v.LocalType ?? v.LocalTier}`));

		for (const v2 of list[k]) {
			const child2 = clone($ModeC_data);
			const span2 = child2.querySelectorAll("span");
			span2[0].appendChild(addText(`${v2.Tier}.${v2.LocalName}`));
			span2[1].appendChild(addText(tagLocalNumber`${v2.DifferenceValue}`));
			if(v2.GorL > 0) span2[1].parentNode.classList.add("gains");
			if(v2.GorL < 0) span2[1].parentNode.classList.add("losses");
			if(v2.notSurchage) span2[1].parentNode.classList.add("gray");

			div.appendChild(child2);
		}
		fragment.appendChild(child);
	}
	$List.appendChild(fragment);
}
const showModeD = filter => {
	const {Container, Type, Tier, Donated} = filter;

	const list = [...ItemMap].filter(([k, v]) => {
		if(v.Type == "Stone") return false;
		if(!Type.includes(v.Type)) return false;
		if(!Tier.includes(v.Tier)) return false;
		return true;
	}).reduce((result, [k, v]) => {
		const key = Container == "Type" ? v.Type : v.Tier;
		if(!result.hasOwnProperty(key)) result[key] = [];
		result[key].push(v);
		return result;
	}, {});

	const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
	const map = Container == "Type" ? TypeMap : TierMap;
	for (const [k, v] of map) {
		if(!list.hasOwnProperty(k)) continue;

		const child = clone($ModeD_group);
		const div = child.querySelector("div");
		const span = child.querySelector("span");
		span.appendChild(addText(`${v.LocalType ?? v.LocalTier}`));

		let flg = false;
		for (const v2 of list[k]) {
			const child2 = clone($ModeD_data);
			const span2 = child2.querySelector("span");
			const checkbox = child2.querySelectorAll("input");

			const {Value, Owned, ValueUp, Donation} = getItemInfo(v2);
			if(Donation?.[Donated]) continue;
			flg = true;

			span2.dataset.Name = v2.Name;
			span2.appendChild(addText(`${v2.Tier}.${v2.LocalName}`));

			checkbox[0].dataset.Name = v2.Name;
			checkbox[0].dataset.key = "Owned";
			checkbox[0].checked = Owned;
			checkbox[0].addEventListener("change", chengeCheckItem);

			checkbox[1].dataset.Name = v2.Name;
			checkbox[1].dataset.key = "ValueUp";
			checkbox[1].checked = ValueUp;
			checkbox[1].addEventListener("change", chengeCheckItem);
			if(v2.Type == "Enchantment") {
				checkbox[1].classList.add("hide2");
				checkbox[1].parentNode.classList.add("hide2");
			}

			const e = child2.querySelectorAll(".Donation");
			e.forEach((v3, i) => {
				v3.dataset.Name = v2.Name;
				v3.dataset.key = "Donation";
				v3.dataset.i = i;
				if(Donation?.[i]) v3.checked = true;
				v3.addEventListener("change", chengeCheckItem);
			});

			div.appendChild(child2);
		};
		if(flg) fragment.appendChild(child);
	};
	$List.appendChild(fragment);
}
const showModeE = filter => {
	const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
	for (const [k, v] of TypeGroupMap) {
		const child = clone($ModeE_group);
		const div = child.querySelector("div");
		const span = child.querySelector("span");
		span.appendChild(addText(`${v.LocalTypeGroup}`));

		for (const v2 of v.Type) {
			const {LocalType, CostDown, TypeValueUp, AllValueUp} = getTypeInfo(v2);

			const child2 = clone($ModeE_data);
			const span2 = child2.querySelector("span");
			const checkbox = child2.querySelectorAll("input");

			span2.appendChild(addText(`${LocalType}`));

			checkbox[0].dataset.Type = v2;
			checkbox[0].dataset.key = "CostDown";
			checkbox[0].checked = CostDown;
			checkbox[0].addEventListener("change", chengeCheckType);

			checkbox[1].dataset.Type = v2;
			checkbox[1].dataset.key = "TypeValueUp";
			checkbox[1].checked = TypeValueUp;
			checkbox[1].addEventListener("change", chengeCheckType);

			checkbox[2].dataset.Type = v2;
			checkbox[2].dataset.key = "AllValueUp";
			checkbox[2].checked = AllValueUp;
			checkbox[2].addEventListener("change", chengeCheckType);

			if(v2 == "Stone" || v2 == "Element" || v2 == "Spirit") {
				checkbox[0].classList.add("hide2");
				checkbox[0].parentNode.classList.add("hide2");
				checkbox[1].classList.add("hide2");
				checkbox[1].parentNode.classList.add("hide2");
			}
			div.appendChild(child2);
		}
		fragment.appendChild(child);
	}
	$List.appendChild(fragment);
}
const getTypeInfo = Type => {
	const {LocalType} = TypeMap.get(Type);
	const {CostDown, TypeValueUp, AllValueUp} = CheckTypeMap.get(Type);
	return {LocalType, CostDown, TypeValueUp, AllValueUp};
}
const showModeF = async filter => {
	const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
	const Container = document.querySelector("[name=Container]:checked").value;
	const donation = document.querySelector("[name=Donation]:checked").value;
	const map = Container == "Type" ? TypeMap : TierMap;
	map.forEach(v => {
		const child = clone($ModeF_group);
		const div = child.querySelector("div");
		const span = child.querySelector("span");
		span.appendChild(addText(`${v.LocalType ?? v.LocalTier}`));

		let flg = false;
		ItemMap.forEach(v2 => {
			if(!filter.type.includes(v2.Type)) return;
			if(!filter.tier.includes(v2.Tier)) return;
			if(v.Type != v2.Type && v.Tier != v2.Tier) return;
			flg = true;

			const child2 = clone($ModeF_data);
			const span2 = child2.querySelectorAll("span");
			span2[0].appendChild(addText(`${v2.Tier}.${v2.LocalName}`));
			span2[1].appendChild(addText(tagLocalNumber`${v2.Value}`));
			span2[1].dataset.value1 = tagLocalNumber`${v2.Value}`;
			span2[1].dataset.value2 = tagLocalNumber`${roundValue(v2.Value2)}`;
			span2[1].dataset.value3 = tagLocalNumber`${v2.GetE}`;
			span2[1].dataset.value4 = tagLocalNumber`${v2.UseE}`;
			span2[1].dataset.value5 = tagLocalNumber`${v2.UseE2}`;

			div.appendChild(child2);
		});
		if(flg) fragment.appendChild(child);
	});
	$List.appendChild(fragment);
}
const roundValue = value => {
	let                  x = 50000;
	if(value <= 1000000) x =  5000;
	if(value <=  100000) x =   500;
	if(value <=   10000) x =    50;
	if(value <=    1000) x =    10;
	return Math.round(value / x) * x;
}
const tagLocalNumber = (sList, ...vList) => {
	const LocalValue = v => {
		return v.toLocaleString();
	}
	return vList
		.map((v, i) => sList[i] + LocalValue(v))
		.concat(sList.slice(vList.length))
		.join("")
	;
}
const switch1 = () => document.querySelectorAll(".switch1").forEach(e => e.classList.value = `switch1 ${document.querySelector("[name=switch1]:checked").value}`);
const chengeCheckItem = async e => {
	const me = e.currentTarget;
	const Name = me.dataset.Name;
	const key = me.dataset.key;
	const i = me.dataset.i;
	const checked = me.checked;

	const _default = {Name, Owned: false, ValueUp: false, Donation: [false, false, false, false, false]};
	const CheckItem = await CheckItemDB.get(Name) ?? _default;
	if(i) {
		CheckItem[key][i] = checked;
	} else {
		CheckItem[key] = checked;
	}

	const parent = me.parentNode.parentNode;
	if(!checked && key == "Owned") {
		parent.querySelector("[data-key=ValueUp]").checked = CheckItem.ValueUp = false;
		parent.querySelector("[data-i='0']").checked = CheckItem.Donation[0] = false;
		parent.querySelector("[data-i='1']").checked = CheckItem.Donation[1] = false;
		parent.querySelector("[data-i='2']").checked = CheckItem.Donation[2] = false;
		parent.querySelector("[data-i='3']").checked = CheckItem.Donation[3] = false;
		parent.querySelector("[data-i='4']").checked = CheckItem.Donation[4] = false;
	}
	if(!checked && key == "ValueUp") {
		parent.querySelector("[data-i='0']").checked = CheckItem.Donation[0] = false;
		parent.querySelector("[data-i='1']").checked = CheckItem.Donation[1] = false;
		parent.querySelector("[data-i='2']").checked = CheckItem.Donation[2] = false;
		parent.querySelector("[data-i='3']").checked = CheckItem.Donation[3] = false;
		parent.querySelector("[data-i='4']").checked = CheckItem.Donation[4] = false;
	}
	if(checked && key == "ValueUp") {
		parent.querySelector("[data-key=Owned]").checked = CheckItem.Owned = true;
	}
	if(checked && key == "Donation") {
		parent.querySelector("[data-key=Owned]").checked = CheckItem.Owned = true;
		parent.querySelector("[data-key=ValueUp]").checked = CheckItem.ValueUp = true;
	}
	CheckItemMap.set(CheckItem.Name, CheckItem);
	CheckItemDB.put(CheckItem);
}
const chengeCheckType = async e => {
	const me = e.currentTarget;
	const Type = me.dataset.Type;
	const key = me.dataset.key;
	const checked = me.checked;

	const _default = {Type, CostDown: false, TypeValueUp: false, AllValueUp: false};
	const CheckType = await CheckTypeDB.get(Type) ?? _default;
	CheckType[key] = checked;

	const parent = me.parentNode.parentNode;
	if(!checked && key == "CostDown") {
		parent.querySelector("[data-key=TypeValueUp]").checked = CheckType.TypeValueUp = false;
		parent.querySelector("[data-key=AllValueUp]").checked = CheckType.AllValueUp = false;
	}
	if(!checked && key == "TypeValueUp") {
		parent.querySelector("[data-key=AllValueUp]").checked = CheckType.AllValueUp = false;
	}
	if(checked && key == "TypeValueUp") {
		parent.querySelector("[data-key=CostDown]").checked = CheckType.CostDown = true;
	}
	if(checked && key == "AllValueUp") {
		parent.querySelector("[data-key=CostDown]").checked = CheckType.CostDown = true;
		parent.querySelector("[data-key=TypeValueUp]").checked = CheckType.TypeValueUp = true;
	}
	CheckTypeMap.set(Type, CheckType);
	CheckTypeDB.put(CheckType);
}
const changeKeep = async e => {
	const me = e.currentTarget;
	const Name = me.dataset.Name;
	const i = me.dataset.i;

	me.classList.toggle("onkeep");

	const _default = {Name, Keep: [false, false, false, false, false]};
	const CheckKeep = await CheckKeepDB.get(Name) ?? _default;
	CheckKeep.Keep[i] = !CheckKeep.Keep[i];
	CheckKeepMap.set(CheckKeep.Name, CheckKeep);
	CheckKeepDB.put(CheckKeep);
}

// 実行開始
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", startup);
